title: Noem intervenes in daughter's denied appraiser license application
summary: Days after South Dakota agency moved to deny Kassidy Peters' real estate appraiser license application, Governor Kristi Noem summoned agency head Sherry Bren and other officials to a meeting with Peters present. Peters ultimately received certification four months later after receiving special treatment including a third chance not available to other applicants.
